trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed" /> and <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> event occurs when a designer finalizes a transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed>設計工具完成交易時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否認可異動的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class, using the specified value that indicates whether the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 使用會指出設計工具是否在異動上呼叫 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> 的指定值，初始化 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否認可異動的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是要關閉的最後一個異動則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If `commit` is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A> property defaults to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`commit`是`true`、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A>屬性預設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this is the last transaction to close.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這是否為要關閉的最後一個異動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是要關閉的最後一個異動則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指示設計工具是否在異動上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果設計工具在異動上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：
